title: [D+] Arkus eSports trial positions (OOL Squad)
body:
Arkus eSports is currently looking for players to trial for a team looking to compete in the second split of 2017 OOL, with the goal of achieving OCS.

Requirements:
- Availability to scrim most weeknights, and weekends for tournament.
- A strong ability to receive constructive criticism.
- A working microphone.
- Competitive experience is a plus, but not required.

We have support staff in place to run and manage the team as they look to qualify for the OCS, and already have some players that have been locked into the roster that you will have a chance to practice and scrim with to see if you click in-game and on the Rift.

If you are interested in trialing for the side, contact myself or reply to this message and we can organise modes of contact.

replies.body: Added you in game. Support main, here.
does it count if im d+ in my mind
